channel.title: Redash - typescript API client and CLI
channel.description:
Hello folks,
I wrote a little API wrapper (`redash-js-client`) that can be used in node and browser environments. There is also a simple CLI exposing the API.
Worth mentioning, that the `getUpdatedResult ` function can calculate all types of dynamic dates them self.
https://github.com/marcolink/redash-tools
Feel free to use!

item.title: Redash - typescript API client and CLI
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Beautiful! Thank you for sharing

Read full topic

item.title: Redash - typescript API client and CLI
item.dc:creator: marcolink
item.description:
Hello folks,

I wrote a little API wrapper (redash-js-client) that can be used in node and browser environments.
There is also a simple CLI exposing the API.

Worth mentioning, that the getUpdatedResult function can calculate all types of dynamic dates them self.

GitHub

marcolink/redash-tools

Tools around https://redash.io. Contribute to marcolink/redash-tools development by creating an account on GitHub.

Feel free to use!

Read full topic
